Desiree Dolron

Desirée Dolron is a world renowned photographer - with series spaning all aspects of human life - from the wonder of a 90’s New York drag festival to the shocking, self mutilating practices of Thailand’s Vegetarian Festical.

Exhibition page

Typography

Flipping convention on its head, an elegant serif display font is paired with a bolder sans-serif body font - with secondary information being offset by a handful of pixels, breaking out of the grid nicely.

1

1.

Typography

Flipping convention on its head, an elegant serif display font is paired with a bolder sans-serif body font - with secondary information being offset by a handful of pixels, breaking out of the grid nicely.

Load More button

This button here takes you to a page of past exhibitions - not only encouraging engagement but also preventing an information 'cul-de-sac'

2

2.

Load More button

This button here takes you to a page of past exhibitions - not only encouraging engagement but also preventing an information 'cul-de-sac'

Homepage

Showcasing Images

Desiree Dolron has some truly exceptional photographic work - so showcasing them here on the homepage was a no-brainer. Each of these panels lead to their associated series to be explored in more detail.

1

1.

Showcasing Images

Desiree Dolron has some truly exceptional photographic work - so showcasing them here on the homepage was a no-brainer. Each of these panels lead to their associated series to be explored in more detail.

Series Page

Bold Hero

As with the homepage, large images and a transparent header are utilised to really make the page pop - adding an almost shock value to the page, contrasting nicely with the elegant spacing and typography.

1

1.

Bold Hero

As with the homepage, large images and a transparent header are utilised to really make the page pop - adding an almost shock value to the page, contrasting nicely with the elegant spacing and typography.

Subnavigation

Extending the subnavigation underneath the hero section breaks out of the grid nicely, whilst also still appearing above the fold - acting as a prompt to scroll when initially landing on the page.

2

2.

Subnavigation

Extending the subnavigation underneath the hero section breaks out of the grid nicely, whilst also still appearing above the fold - acting as a prompt to scroll when initially landing on the page.

Contact Page

Transparent dynamic header

The header here is not only transparent, so as to showcase the image, but also dynamic - with the colour of the page links dynamically chaning depending on the brightness of the underlying image.

1

1.

Transparent dynamic header

The header here is not only transparent, so as to showcase the image, but also dynamic - with the colour of the page links dynamically chaning depending on the brightness of the underlying image.
